channel.title: Can anyone help me or not? I need the coding not some rediculous post
channel.description: Okay I asked 3 times now and I haven't gotten a direct answer. I asked for a command to change my npc id NOT PNPC, I just need the coding that I can add to a command the npc I want to turn into is 2745

item.title: Can anyone help me or not? I need the coding not some rediculous post
item.dc:creator: @crom170 crom170
item.description:
@crom170 wrote:

no but it makes them happy and then theres one less question in the world;P

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone help me or not? I need the coding not some rediculous post

item.title: Can anyone help me or not? I need the coding not some rediculous post
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“adamhelloman8, post:6, topic:264695”]So you want a pnpc command?

if(command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 2){ int npc = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if(npc < 2745){ npcId = npc; npcId2 = npc; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

than you can do your ::pnpc 2745[/quote][quote=“crom170, post:7, topic:264695”]if(command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 2){ int npc = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if(npc < 2745){ npcId = npc; npcId2 = npc; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } if(command.startsWith("unpc") && playerRights >= 2){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

The server help is here for a reason. lawl
its here to ask for help.
stop saying it isnt.[/quote]
Spoonfeeding isn’t really helping, tbh.

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone help me or not? I need the coding not some rediculous post

item.title: Can anyone help me or not? I need the coding not some rediculous post
item.dc:creator: @crom170 crom170
item.description:
@crom170 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 2){ int npc = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if(npc < 2745){ npcId = npc; npcId2 = npc; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } if(command.startsWith("unpc") && playerRights >= 2){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

The server help is here for a reason. lawl
its here to ask for help.
stop saying it isnt.

item.title: Can anyone help me or not? I need the coding not some rediculous post
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

So you want a pnpc command?

if(command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 2){ int npc = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if(npc < 2745){ npcId = npc; npcId2 = npc; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

than you can do your ::pnpc 2745

Read full topic
